long_description: The Patagonia Active Camisole with a built-in bra can be worn alone or as a base layer. Quick-drying, soft fabric blend with moisture-wicking performance helps keep you dry; fabric features high recycled content. Supportive design features a built-in shelf bra and straps with adjustable, nonslip shoulder straps. Seamless construction reduces chafing. Extended hem offers extra coverage to pair with low-rise pants, shorts or skirts. The Patagonia Active Camisole is formfitting. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia.
short_description: The Patagonia Active Camisole with a built-in bra can be worn alone or as a base layer.
